summary: The Artificial Intelligence and Critical Technology Workforce Framework Act of 2025 aims to expand the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)'s role in developing workforce frameworks for critical and emerging technologies, particularly Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Cybersecurity. The bill mandates the creation of AI workforce frameworks, updates to the NICE Cybersecurity Workforce Framework, and resources in multiple languages. It also focuses on incorporating professional skills, diverse career pathways, and credentialing information to attract individuals from various backgrounds.
